raw_response: {"answer_index": 3, "answer_text": "Oral mifepristone + misoprostol", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "This patient is in the early first trimester (about 5 weeks gestation) and desires elective termination. Medical abortion with mifepristone followed by misoprostol is the recommended and most appropriate method for early pregnancy termination (up to 9 weeks gestation). Manual uterine aspiration is also an option but is usually considered when medical abortion is contraindicated or not preferred. D&E and oxytocin-induced labor are used for later gestational ages.", "evidence_quality": "normal"}
